events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it doesn't fit me at all. I'd like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message regarding return and money back.
An agent from the refunds department has been assigned to handle this case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, could you please share the order number and the reason for the return?
The order number is 123456789, and the jacket is simply too small for me despite checking the size chart.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process immediately and send you a prepaid shipping label to return the jacket.
That sounds perfect, thank you for the quick assistance. I will wait for the shipping label.
We have sent the prepaid shipping label to your email. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed promptly.
We are following up to confirm if you were able to return the jacket and if your refund has been processed to your satisfaction.
The refund has been completed and the case is now closed. Please contact us again if you need any further assistance.
